appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Create address markers in Map Maker with one click
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

loading.description: Message that shows while loading the popup

addressHelperDescription.message: This will automatically add and save a new address for the given options.
addressHelperDescription.description: Label describing the extenstion in the popup

streetNumHint.message: Start adding addresses at this number

streetNameHint.message: This needs to be exactly as you would pick it when adding manually

townCityHint.message: Specify this if the Town / City doesn't get set automatically

autoIncLabel.description: Label for auto increment check box

autoIncHint.message: If you specify 'Auto Increment', once you place each address marker you can immediately place the next address number until you cancel
autoIncHint.description: Hint for auto increment check box

incByLabel.description: Label for increment by drop down

showHints.description: Label for show hints toggle menu item
